      Fields in org.apache.hadoop.hbase.mapred declared as BufferedMutator

      private BufferedMutator TableOutputFormat.TableRecordWriter.m_mutator 
      Constructors in org.apache.hadoop.hbase.mapred with parameters of type BufferedMutator 
      Constructor and Description
      TableRecordWriter(BufferedMutator mutator)
      Deprecated. 
      since 2.0.0 and will be removed in 3.0.0. Please use #TableRecordWriter(JobConf) instead. This version does not clean up connections and will leak connections (removed in 2.0).
